module: Module-level comment: The 'rom' module implements a read-only memory (ROM), outputting an 8-bit data byte based on a 16-bit input address. Utilizing the 'altsyncram' component configured via parameters for ROM function with a memory initialization file, it aligns data retrieval with a clock input. Internal wiring bridges component output to the module's 'q' output, ensuring synchronized, accurate data presentation on the specified address.
